items.name: Emergency Plumbing Service - After Hours
items.description: Emergency plumbing service call, after hours premium

notes: Backflow testing is compliance-driven recurring revenue
Water heater replacements are high-volume residential
All products use major manufacturer pricing (Rheem, Watts, Zoeller)
